content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of june 6 at approx 10:30pm est, a group of 6 friends were wrapping up a barbeque in a backyard in applewood acres in boardman oh. the woman across from me was chattering away when she looked over my shoulder an said " omg! what is that in the trees?" we all ran into the back of the lot and watched this object in the moonlight move slowly above the treeline. at first, we could only see one light thru the trees but then another appeared as it moved into a clearing between the trees. the object hovered there for about 2 minutes-  no sound!!. we could faintly make out the shape as a triangle, grey color like a shadow, with red/white lights on edges that flickered like a flame or a plasma torch. they weren't solid or predictable like a plane's light, but random. we watched for about 3 minutes until a helo came close, and it stopped and hovered as if watching too! seconds later, the whatever slowly backed up away from the helo and the lights got dimmer until we couldn't see it anymore. the only place that has helo's that is close is the hospital life flight about a mile away. just ironic that it would be in the same place at the same time as this "whatever"!! we are all sure of what we saw but can't explain what it would be doing near a strip of land with strings of power lines and residential lots! mass halucination? or?

ps----  none of us drink!!!
content.summary: Red and white flickering lights apprx 500 yards away just above trees.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching some fireworks coming from a housing addition across a field for a few minutes and then they stopped - and a short time later i saw an orange round object come up from the southern sky and move north in a straight line - the people that had the fireworks must have seen it too - i could hear their voices and they weren't lighting any more fireworks. when i first caught sight of it, i thought perhaps it was some type of firework, but it kept moving from the south, i also thought maybe it was an aircraft and thought maybe when my view of it shifted i would see the navigation lights, but when it got more or less overhead, the object was illuminated exactly the same as when i first saw it (only a little bigger). about that time i realized i was seeing something very unusual and i had a quick thought to grab my binoculars and the camera, but i was afraid if i went back inside the house i would miss something. there was absolutely no sound, no aircraft navigation/beacon lights and the object maintained the same orange color and shape regardless of the viewing angle and distance i was seeing it - i was seeing a definite shape, and not merely a blob of light. i kept watching it move almost due north until it was just an orange point of light far off to the north and then it disappeared. i remember thinking - this is unbelievable - i can't believe i'm seeing this.
content.summary: Bright orange object moving from south to north over indiana.

content.detailedDescription:
After observing approximately 25 ufo sightings during the past 12 months in and around the westlake, louisiana area; i am somewhat reluctant to file the attached report which i consider the least of all the aforementioned sightings. however, the sightings around here seem to be tapering off a bit as i have not had any in the months of april or may, so out of boredom from a lack of activity, i submit this report.

on the evening of june 5, 2009 at 9:00 pm, i stepped outside my house to scan the sky before retiring for the evening. the sky was extremely clear and all the stars were visible although somewhat dim due a nearly full moon. 

after slowly doing a 360 degree scan of the sky three times without seeing anything remarkable, i started walking toward my front door when i noticed an object lit up in the western sky about 45 degrees above the horizon. 

the object can best be described as appearing somewhat like a very bright planet venus, except it was approximately four times larger. the object appeared to just appear out of nowhere in the middle of the sky as it was headed north. the object was brightly illuminated for two seconds and would then quickly dim completely out of sight for 10-15 seconds and then reappear brightly for two more seconds. this sequence was repeated three times. each time the object traveled approximately 20 degrees across the sky before it lit back up after 10-15 seconds.

there was absolutely no noise at all outside during the entire 50 seconds or so of elapsed time of this sighting. 

i do not believe this sighting to be a normal aircraft due to a total silence during the time of the sighting, a lack of strobes and directional markers, and the relative size would be much larger than a jetliner at cruising altitude. also, the speed of the object would have been much faster than a conventional aircraft. i also dismiss the notion of this being a satellite, as it was much larger and brighter than any satellite i have witnessed before. besides, i have never seen satellites turn on and off before either.
content.summary: Large moving planet???

content.detailedDescription: I never saw a u.F.O. that night but i saw a reddish blue yellow glow behind some trees. i was a line cook up at the grand canyon at el tovar. after 10pm all restaurants close and you can only get food from vending machines. i was on my way to get some food from my dorm and this strange glow caught my attention out a ways in the forrest. i went and got my navajo friend ( luke bigman) and we went towards this glow which was about maybe 50 feet or more into the woods. he was talking in navajo and before we got to a hill that came up to a top we saw three small looking things. we were about maybe 15 to 20 feet before we saw these shadowy figures that seemed about 4 to five feet tall doing something on the ground. they seemed to be looking or doing something on the ground. as we got a little closer one of them turned around and you could see its face. honestly it did not look like most aliens you see on t.V. or sketches. they looked very human. it had a slightly big head,bald and in little suits and larger eyes then a man but like i said not like sketches or paintings you would see on t.V. this all happend fast and as soon as it looked our way the other two walked off quickly behind the trees. the one just stood there and looked at us kind of liked an animal looks at you waiting to see who would move first. it then turned around and walked in the same direction as the other two. me and luke took a few steps back and were ready to run and at that time the light went out.We never saw a ship shoot off but we did notice a strange smell in the air kind of like a dry sweet burning smell. we walked backwards untill we got to the edge of the parking lot and told a few people which they thought we were drunk or on drugs.The next day i went out to the spot i thought the light came from and there was four impressions and burst reddish glass beads and the smell of that sweet burnt. i never reported it because of the b.S. those and these days and we (me and luke) spoke about a few times but nobody would believe us. i even told a park ranger and his only comment was to be careful and not venture into the woods late at night for fear of bears or getting lost. i just wanted to share my story if you believe me or not does not matter. but after that i started getting into hubble space pics and re-thinking if we really are the only ones out in this great huge universe. p.S. another reason i contacted you was because in january wheb a supposed ufo was over texas out here it made me think about that night in arizona with the same colors as the constible or some other guy filmed. that light looked the almost exact same.
content.summary: Bluish/red/green yellow light in arizona 1993 around nov.18 or 21 around 2am.

content.detailedDescription:
i left a friends house in the early morning of june 6th, around 2:30am. on the way, i noticed an oddly bright light in the north sky. it appeared about 3-5x bigger than the brightest star in the sky. just a little more than enough to clearly define that it was not a star. when you looked close with a naked eye, it seemed to be strobing through different colors. so i rushed home to get my camera. this was my 3rd time witnessing strange lights in the sky, none caught on camera, so i was very eager to get this one. i live about 45 mins south of wright patterson afb located in dayton, oh. i'm in erlanger, ky. i believe this could explain my multiple sightings.
   when i got home i immediately grabbed the camera, which ironically had no charge, it was left running the last time i used it. so after getting my power cord, finding it was too short to reach, unplugging the fish tank(poor guys), grabbing the extension cord, and plugging everything up, i was finally able to begin rolling around 3:00am. 
   everything was recorded from my 2nd floor balcony, with my panosonic sdr-s7 camcorder. i filmed the light for at least an hour, using both manual and auto zoom. zooming in, zooming out. in the zoomed video you can clearly see the strobing plasma lights and its overall, beauty, i guess is the best way to say it. it's really bright and weird aurora's and strobes are visible, clearly. i had no tripod, but i did stablize the camera on my balcony banister with my right hand, and used my left hand to prop it up towards the light. it's pretty good footage, even capturing 700x zoom, while somehow keeping the craft in frame. when zoomed in, the light flattened out durastically. basically, it looked like a dog bowl shaped disc, as it appeared to be circular with depth. also, zooming in revealed the strobing, or pulsing, plasma-like lights were coming from the top of the craft or light. at this point i knew it was a craft of some kind, beaming with light energy, or something!
   after filming the object for over an hour, i was very tired, i had left my friends to go straight to bed, until i saw the light. although i very badly wanted to record all night, into the next day, i had just enough satisfaction from catching it on tape, that i was able to go to sleep. i checked on it for the last time sometime after 4:00am, and it was still there. after that night, it hasn't been there since.
   


 attatched is about 3 minutes of the best segment of footage i have, using manual zoom. at one point, when the object is out of focus, it appears as a blur, but this blur is perfectly flat on the bottom. i am not sure if this is anomolous, or just a normal thing. definitely adds to the video though. i have 20-30 mins total of unedited footage that i am more than willing to upload all of it if you are interested. 
  thanks for your time.  -mark
content.summary: Beautiful pulsing plasma-like light, stationary, video proof,  filmed 40 mins south of wright patterson afb.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the right place, at the right time.  i was waiting for my wife to get the car. as i was bored i was looking up. i saw what at first i thought was a high flying jet. as i studied it i realized it was not a jet, but something eles. 
the object was silver in color, sort of eliptcal in shape, made no vapor trail, no noise, and was moving very fast. it was much faster than a jet. in a few seconds it was gone traveling from the north to the south.
content.summary: High flying object.

content.detailedDescription:
Took a pic of a jet and contrail, and the two spheres showed up on the jet that were not visible with binoculars. also if you zoom in there is another something a little higher and to the right of the jet.
oakland county michigan has been having busy skies
content.summary: Spheres and a shape showed up in picture.

content.detailedDescription: I left work at about 10:10 pm that night and walked home (about 150 yards)from the resturaunt where i am a chef. i walked into the house and my wife asked me to take the dog out because he had been whining at the door. nathen and i walked out the front door and went around to the backyard where he proceeded to do his doggie thing running and playing. i was a very clear night, a lot of stars and warm. i looked up to the north towards the new mexico military academy. i saw somthing that i thought was a dove fluttering as if trying to land on a wire from the telephone poles. as i stared at it i realised that not a dove at all or a bird of anykind, i was a fluttring dim pulsating thing that would hang in one place for about 30 seconds or so then move along to another location in the sky and stop again and flutter and pulsate and move again all in a north to south direction towards the roswell airport. if you were to watch a hummingbird feeding off a bush or a plant its motions were very similar. hover in one spot then move along but not in a stright line but a very deliberate direction.I watched for about 10 minutes and started hollering for my wife to confirm what i was seeing.She came outside and when i pointed it out to her she watched along with me. in about 2 minutes it did a sharp left turn to the east and was gone. she looked at me and said i you say somthing about this people will think your nuts or drunk or trying to gain attention. she said so you saw a ufo just shut up and she went into the house with the dog. i grabbed my cell phone and tryed to call the roswell airport but they would not take any calls for some reason and all i got was first a busy signal and then a recording telling me to try again later. and thats my story.....I know what i saw and it was not a bird or a plane or a weather ballon or chopper from the base or hospital.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Moving like a hummingbird feeding from flower to flower.

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i like to take night nature drives on the backside of calaveras rd. through the canyon from fremont to milpitas. with hopes of seeing bobcats or mountain lions, strange owls, etc. last night,june 9, we left at about 11:15pm. we're driving along, pointing out the diffrent lights (planes, since it is in the flight path of most major airports for the area). at approximately the last 2 miles of the drive about 12:15 am june 10th, my boyfriend yells, "what the f*** is that!?", i look up and see a huge red and blue light, hovering right above the top of the mountain. (way too close to be an airplane) the lights were flashing in such a way that there was no pattern to them. the craft's outline was hard to make out since the lights were so large on it. my best assumption would be disc or boomerang. we were about 200ft from it at first and at one point it came very close to where we were and i had only caught one side which was white or grey and sort of rectangluar with a round edge looking. made no sound at all. it was just hovering in the same spot, but moving within that spot, sort of in a circular motion. then it zipped over quickly about 100ft to the right, then back to where it was. we stopped the car immediately. i instantly started freaking out. this was like nothing i had ever seen, the movement, the size, and no sound! we decided it was best to not continue going toward it, so we stayed in the same spot for about 10 min, my boyfriend watched in amazment, i opened and closed my eyes, this was way to freaky for me! once it started moving slowly away from our direction and behind the hill out of our sight, we proceeded foward to exit the canyon. with me still crying, we got to the end of the canyon road, where we would make a right turn to go about one mile back into milpitas. then we saw it again! hovering and buzzing over a different hill, but this time a little bit in front of it, more over the city. we sat and watched for about a half hour more, as it stangely flashed and hovered very quickly in about a 100ft area.  my boyfriend was really excited and wanted a closer look, so we started driving toward the city to maybe find a better viewing spot. once we exited we saw no trace of the craft.  we drove around the area for another 45 mins, still baffled and scared, we couldn't locate it again.
content.summary: Strange hovering/ buzzing craft on the edge of calaveras canyon.

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of march 22, 2009, at approximately 19:45 hours, i was traveling southbound on i-25 approximately five miles north of the loveland, co area when i noticed a set of lights in the sky that were approximately 250��� above the ground that were remaining stationary.  as i traveled closer i was able to see that the lights were part of an aircraft/mechanical object.  this object was directly above the southeast corner of the i-25 to c-392 interchange.  the object was comprised of square shaped beams making up a metallic silver cross of equal dimension on the x and y axis, with a circular shaped ring of the same silver metallic material that encompassed the outside of the cross and connected at the ending points of the cross itself.  the distance/size across the bottom of the cross/ring section was approximately 50 feet.  

there was a large dome light in the direct center of the ���cross,��� and four smaller lights at the end points of cross sections just prior to where the circular section met the square cross sections.  there was a dark, solid section that extended above the cross/circle, but i was unable to identify any specific details/shape of this dark colored area.  it���s height seemed to be about one third to half the size of the width of the craft.  the five lights on the bottom of the craft were solid white, neither blinking nor changing color.  the large center light was the lowest part of the craft, with no type of landing gear or runners (such as seen on helicopters) being visible.

the craft was perfectly stationary as it ���hovered��� in the air, neither tilting nor moving in any specific direction.  after i passed by/under it, and traveled for approximately ��� of a mile, the craft tilted on an approximate 30 degree slant and began to slowly travel towards the west.  i could no longer identify/see the craft after five minutes or so.  

there were numerous people/cars traveling on the road at this time who also could have seen this craft quite easily, but i have not been able to find any mention of this type of craft or anyone who saw it and/or had the opportunity to photographed or video capture the event.
content.summary: Metallic silver cross/ring with lights hovers above highway.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking outside to attend to my barking dogs.  when i got out there i noticed that there was a strange light comming closer to me.  as it flew over head it dimmed untill it passed over.  once it passed the light grew bright as if they where only on the side.
content.summary: Flew over head with green lights

content.detailedDescription:
A one inch (size in the sky) cylindrical shaped object with a red light amidship came from the west and made a slow silent turn to the south. it came back north, turned to the west and disappeared. no sound. the west to southwest turn was smooth and then the flight south appeared erratic. i had no idea of what it could be.
i was in my back yard patio as i do when my yorkie has to go outside. i always hoped to see something in the sky since i observed a slow west to east object blueish in color back in 1951.
content.summary: A one inch (size in the sky) cylindrical shaped object with a red light amidship came from the west and made a slow silent turn to the south. it came back north, turned to the west and dissapeared. no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking our dog in my side yard in sharon, pa.  it was still light, 2032, and i happened to look up over our house.  i saw an extreamely bright silver cylinder traveling north east above sharon.  

i first thought it was a commercial jet, but i couldn't hear any engine noise.  i tried to make out wings and tail, but the object was reflecting so much sunlight that it was too dazzling to make out features.  

the most strange thing was that it emmitted a white exhust, not a con-trail as airplanes make, but an almost "fan shape" exhust that was only about the same length as the object was long.  not like an airplane that has a mile long contrail.  this fan shaped exhust was "broken"....Think of many short lines, one behind the other, all forming a fan shape.

i can't estimate the altitude, if it was a jet liner, it was very low and i'd have heard it.  it was on a very steady course never changeing speed, course or altitude.

i went inside the house for my camera and binoculars, but when i got back it had gone into or over clouds and i didn't see it again.  this whole event lasted about 3 minutes.
content.summary: Cylinder shape bright silver emitting something white at rear.

content.detailedDescription:
I have already call george parks (az mufon rep)and gave him my description over the phone, he asked me to submit this here.

i was in my pool in mid town tucson looking for objects in the sky, hence the term sky watcher, thats what i do!!! i looked to the nw above my house; in the distance (20000 to 30000 feet in the air at an approx. angle of 25 degrees, i saw a small white pulsating light moving from my left to my right. since i was in the pool and felt very lucky to have seen it at all, i decided to keep my eyes on this object. (if i got out and got my binoculars i would have never found it again) i slowly move to the edge of my pool and kept my eyes fixed on this "thing". the pulse was constant and never changing. if i was to guess; i would say that this thing was going as fast, if not faster than the planes way up in the sky that normally leave some sort of vapor trail. (again 20 to 30 thousand feet) so i would guess 300 to 500 miles an hour. as soon as i got to the edge of the pool this object seemed to curve to its left and was heading due north heading toward mt. lemmon. later my son who does believe in ufo's asked me if it could have been a ballon. i said yes, if it was the size of this pool and flying at 300 to 500 mile an hour. the pulsing light was consistant, not random. it wasn't a mylar ballon catching the light an reflecting toward me. it seemed to be fading just about 30 to 40 seconds after it headed north. i think it could have been slowly decending, but as something flys away from you it does appear to be decending so i'm not sure if it actually lowered in altitude.
content.summary: Small pulsating sphere view from a distance (high in the sky) heading east then curved sharply to the north.

content.detailedDescription:
In frederick, md, within 40 miles radius of the dc unit) we sat outside and were visited by first an et contact, 10ft tall skinny lit up dudes, 2 fleets of 3 ships. william was totally talking to whoever the intelligence was - as was will. the message was to use the triad-trinity alignment of mind (pineal), heart and root chakra (genitals) to enable human freedom and root self in awareness/love. however, within minutes of the last contact, we were bombarded by black ops probing which unfortunately was quite painful. will and myself both felt like needle probes. him in the frontal lobe. me on the right side of my head between the temple and cheekbone - the good news is that the combination of clear skies, the void and the great hall (google search bob dratch) are disabling some nasty circuits and enabling a drain at the same time.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

et contact event ~~ saturdays, june 13th/20th/27th @ 9 p.M. est.

these are followup events to the june 6th 'd-day contact event'.

our saturday night meetings are potluck arrangements, so bring a dish you think others will enjoy.

if this will be your first time attending the event, no need to bring a dish - just chairs for you and your friends attending.

our group successfully made contact for several hours on june 6th, and will continue to expand our connection with our elder brothers and sisters in the universe every saturday until a global contact event transpires.

the address for the june events is 4412 reels mill road, frederick, md.

contact todd or nora @ 301-320-0645 for additional information/directions as needed.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two sets of three lights moving in strategic formation across sky.

content.detailedDescription: Sunset, while in a park in santa fe new mexico, an extremely slivery bright light tear drop shape high in the sky to the west. did not appear to be a weather baloon. changed from bright silvery light to orange over about an hour. later changed from tear dropped to round. a loooong distance away and high. one man watching with me said he had seen what he thought was the same object when he went to work 12 hours earlier at los alamos national labs, new mexico, before sunrise. located at approximately the same position in the sky. high up and a long way away. some clouds moved in but you could still see the bright round shape through the thin clouds. i went home and could no longer see the object due to buildings. definately not the moon.Will look at the same location today....It is cloudy so probably not able to see.
content.summary: Extremely bright slow moving tear drop.

content.detailedDescription: We heard a loud bang as it crash to the grass then it caght alight a started spewing off sparks like fireworks. then the police came and taped it off and i was staggerd.
content.summary: Bright like fireworks.

content.detailedDescription:
My son was driving east on peters road approaching state road seven at approximately 1 pm. i noticed a white cylinder slowly flying from north to south in the distance. it looked to be about an inch long at arms length and about 1/8 inch from top to bottom. it's movement was slow in fact at first i thought that it may have been a blimp as we have them often here. but it was not tapered, it was a solid whiteish color and there were no markings. it was at about a 35 degree angle. 
i pointed it out to my son who also thought it looked similar to a blimp. we watched it travel 5 inches (at arms length) then dissapear. it almost looked like it evaporated, faded. the distance from us was hard to estimate as of course it would all depend on the length of the object. if i had to guess i woud say no more than 2 miles and that is a guess at best.
there were clouds but nothing as low in altitude as this was.
we discussed what we saw and somethings did not make this easy to explain.
as i said a blimp is not a cylinder it's tapered and usuallu has bright colors etc. also if it had turned as opposed to "vanish" the profile would have slowly shortened as it did. also this cylinder appeared to
as far as i can tell fly level with no discernable motion usually blimps have a slight tilt and tend to have some up and down motion over a period of time. 
in the end we were at a loss to nail it down to a specific source that we could easily identify. now i have read a lot of literature on the subject, dr j allen hynek and tried to observe carefully as to not make a simple error, so although i am not "trained" i am cautious.
content.summary: My son and i saw a cylinder flying then vanish.

content.detailedDescription: It started on the 8th at 10:30 pm. i was talking to my girlfriend on the phone when i noticed a strange noise. it sounded like a mix between a flag blowing in the wind and a sparkler burning. it was coming from the sky and was loud enough that i notced it while in the middle of a conversation. i was on my back porch which faces east.  the noise seemed to be coming from the east.  i looked all around the sky but saw nothing. i yelled at my brother inside the house to come out and listen.  after a while,  i walked a few blocks away to the police station where i could see the whole sky.  there was not a thing that i noticed.  there was no wind at all so i was very curious to what was making the sound. it was coming from the sky. i live fairly close to the interstate and am very used to the sound as i smoke outside and here it at least an hour a day. i finally went back inside to watch a movie but came out over the next 2 hours frequently and the sound was still there.  i stay up late because i work nights but was off this particular night. at 2:00 am,  my girlfriend came over. i met her outside on my back porch.  the sound was more faint at this time but was still fairly easy to hear. my girlfriend picked up the binoculars and looked toward where the sound was coming from.  she instantly spotted something. when i looked through the binoculars i could see what appeared to be an upside down triangle.  with the naked eye it looked like a faint star.  at first i thought it was a star that just looked strange through binoculars. then i realized it wasn't when i noticed it was slowly moving all around the eastern sky.  i could tell it was moving because of it's relation in the sky to the stars and the trees behind my house. we then got out my brothers rifle with a high powered scope. we could really see much more detail with the scope.  the triangle always stayed upside down with some black in the middle. it was reflecting tv mmonlight as it was a full moon or at least pretty close to it. we watched the object for about three hours. when it finally dipped to low for me to see it over the trees, i got in my car and drove to the service road next to the interstate.  as i drove east up the road, i could not see any stars because it was very bright in the area because of all the city lights. day break was also beginning. as i prepared to turn around,  i saw what appeared to be a super bright star in the east. it was very, very bright.  it was the only light i could see in the sky. it appeared to be just a few miles away. because i was low on gas,  i could not get on the interstate and try to get any closer. at this same time, my stepfather, who is a pilot was on his back porch having his morning coffee. he noticed the same light and was bewildered by it also.  he had could not explain it either. when i got home i tried to find the triangle and the bright light again but had no luck.
content.summary: Triangle moving around sky for hours. later at daybreak saw super bright object.

content.detailedDescription:
while camping on the oregon coast near garibaldi with my family, my brother in law and i saw a large, very bright, star like object moving slowly above us. it was obviously not a star because it was moving slow like a helicopter except there was no sound.The size of this single very bright light was so large it could not have been a satellight.
  we only saw it for a few seconds because of trees around us. i saw it first and pointed it out to him. we both said huh! and chuckled. later the more i thought of it the more i knew it was odd.
content.summary: Large, star like, round, very bright, moving across sky slowly.

content.detailedDescription: At 9:30 pm est i with my husband witnessed a red ball of light with a tiny white dot on the bottom.  we do know it was not a plane, and it had no trail.  the event lasted approx. 2 minutes or so before it was out of sight.  it was moving diagonally across the sky in a north western pattern (not normal because our weather always flows south east or north east)  we never heard a sound from it, but it appeared to be pretty high.  when we took a picture and then reviewed it, it looks like multiple lights, but from the gound it looked like just one.  the quality of my picture may not be that great either.  oh, well.  i just wanted to share what we saw!!  you will need to zoom in on the picture to get a good look at the lights
content.summary: Red light with white belly.

content.detailedDescription:
November 14,2008, my son and i were hunting in corona, new mexico. we were hunting in state land where no one ever hunts the area. it happened about 6:30 am on the morning of our hunting day. we came along a nice big buck. i shot at it, but the buck kept going we didn't know for sure if we hit it . we were tracking the deer in bad terraine where i didn't think no one was ever in this mountain terraine . when we came up to this strange object i was driving the for wheeler, my son was on the back. i told my son," what is that ". i knew it was nothing fom this world, i told my son [cms/tg/pid]. that it is a ufo alien. it scared the holy cow out of us. we found the head under a pine tree, and there were bones scattered arond the area where i found the head. my family and i were from corona, nm. we moved from corona in 1968 to belen, nm. where my family and i live. my sister who is 60 years of age told me that a ufo crashed in corona, nm on the day of 1964 on a private ranch or state land. approximatly 80 miles from the town of roswell, nm crash site. 
     
       i don't want to send a video clip or a photo at this time.

      sincerly, 
          
         [cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: Ufo cranium/skull.

content.detailedDescription: setting: at the back porch and talking on the phone. a mettallic yet fluidlike cube seemed to be rolling at or slightly below marine layer height which, yesterday, was approximately 1800 ft. and just breaking up to typical afternoon sunshine, i.E. partly cloudy skies. the object appeared thumbnail-size which would suggest an actual size of a van or small house. the object was traveling wnw at a relatively slow rate of speed and seemed to shift out of visual phase as waves might cancel each other when out of phase (pardon my physics).
content.summary: Fluidlike mettallic rolling cube shifted out of visual phase.

content.detailedDescription: Was heard first at 11pm.  could not see it.  then spotted it at 1am.  watched for about 5 hours.  it was a triangle that was catching light from moon.  triangle had another triangle inside of it.  not sure if this is manmade or not.  it hovered for hours only moving slightly.  there was not wind and it was a very clear night.  could be seen very clearly through a high quality scope.  at daybreak it became very bright and almost looked like a planet or star with the naked eye but much brighter.  this was seen by three people.  if anyone else saw or heard anything in the area please contact me.  thanks.
content.summary: Triangle that was not illuminated. made static/mechanical sound. hovered for five hours.

content.detailedDescription: Ok first i was inside playing with my brother and i asked my mom if i could go out side and she said yes so i went out side and i was playin and i was looking at the clouds and then i saw something like an egg and it stooped in the middle and went up and it disapeard
content.summary: I dont know how to explain it.

content.detailedDescription: Laying on the beach and noticed object on the horizon above the ocean.  jokingly said it was a ufo and started filming.   at first thought it might be a plane landing but object seemed to stay stationary for the most part and planes would not make there approach that close to the water that far out. as a matter of fact you can hear a jet taking off during the video so it couldn't have been another approaching plane.  object hovered for several more minutes before disappearing.  object seems to jump quite abit on frames time 14-15 sec. done in slow motion and even though camera was a little shaky the object seems to move to the left very fast about 2 inches across the screen.  i was zoomed in as close as i could get with my camera but it was at least several miles out above the ocean.  started talking with my friends again and later looked back and was gone.  p.S.  if you hear my friends talking about a crow on the video there was one on the beach that they were referring to and not what i was filming. just an fyi.
content.summary: Dark fuzzy hovering object.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband i were heading south on i-5 towards home from having dinner with friends. neither one of us had alcohol in our systems. we were having a conversation as we passed the weigh station right before our exit- woodburn. a bright light caught the corner of our eyes at the same time. all we said was "whoa, what's that"? the time around 11:15-11:20 p.M. the sky was nice and clear. had been hot that whole week. this bright circle shaped ball appeared high in the sky to our left. it was a bluish green, almost like teal color. it was traveling at an extremely fast speed and had a tail trailing behind it. there was no sound and it only lasted like 10 seconds as it went from up high to our left then traveled diaganally down to the bottom right. it went a great distance in a matter of seconds and continued flying downward smoothly till it looked like it crashed over the free way out of our sight. hard to say the distance it was from us. it appeared to be huge judged by sight. even if the object was indeed close to us, it would have been atleast 3 airplanes together in size. if it was far away, just means it was even bigger. my husband claimed there was no way it could of been a coment or meterorite or shooting star. it was too close to earths surface, and the color was just out of this world. the color was almost magical, just bright and beautiful. it had an appearance as if the object was on fire. my dream would be to witness a ufo crash, unfortunatly, we did not get to see it hit ground. my husband has always been skeptical and non-believer of ufo's till now. i on the other hand have always been aware of their existence. just a matter of time till everyone is awakened to the truth. untill then, keep looking up
-tiffany
content.summary: Blue/green fireball with tail.

content.detailedDescription: Using my 8" schmidt/cass celestron telescope with a ccd camera linked with my laptop i caught this event while setting up my system. event occurred at 42 seconds into the video. i caught it while watching the process on my laptop. immediately looked into the sky but could not see any evidence of a plane or lights of a plane. observing conditions were light cloud cover which was spotty, cool evening temperature approx. 61 degrees.
content.summary: Casually videoing moon through telescope an caught unusal event.

content.detailedDescription: At approx: 12:30 pm i was standing by the drivers side door of my 2000 ford explorer and was looking up into the sky when i observed a long black object in the break of the clouds. it resembled a cigar shape but i didn't reconize it as anything i had seen before. the object was traveling north between philadelphia, pa and the blackhorse pike in  turnersville, new jersey at approx: 10 miles per hour and at a 15 degree angle. i observed the object for approx: one (1) minute. then the object disapered suddenly. the were no planes in the air at this time. this event happen so suddenly that i didn't have time to get my camera or binoculars.
content.summary: Black cigar shaped without wings or tail.

content.detailedDescription:
on the afternoon of may 30, 2009, my four year old son and i were playing soccer at deerfield park in smithfield ri. shortly after 1700 hours a silent triangle shaped aircraft flew over us at around 3000 ft. the speed of the craft was very slow and i estimate its size to be between 45 ft to 50 ft wide. i then ran to my car to get my digital camera. as i ran to my car the craft accelerated in speed and altitude. by the time i started filming the craft was at a altitude of 15000 to 20000 ft. in my film the craft can be seen flying in and out of the clouds in a circular motion. the entire event lasted less than ten minutes. i filmed the object for three minutes until the batteries in my camera died.  soon after the object flew out of view.
 
  there were at least eight to ten other witnesses, but they were all strangers and i have no way of contacting them. my first thought was that it was a unmanned drone. possibly used by the dea to search for marijuana fields in the area. it was the most unusual thing i have ever witnessed. i have also filed a report with the national ufo reporting center. because of the size of the file i have been having trouble emailing the file. i am willing to mail copies of the video to an investigator.
content.summary: Triangle craft over smithfield ri
